function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective risk communication in outbreak management","Impact":"Impeded emergency response and undermined public perception","Mitigation":"Enhance accessibility and openness of information, keep the public regularly and timely informed, and develop communication strategies dealing with uncertainties","Technologies":"Information sharing platforms, real-time communication tools, data visualization techniques","People":"Public, government, experts","Owner":"Government, experts"}]}
